name: ikono
description: A large collection of high quality SVG icons with an MIT license

scripts.update_icons: node ./scripts/generatePNG.js && node ./scripts/build.js && node ./scripts/build_react.js && cd react && npm run build
scripts.prebuild_and_publish: npm run generate_web && npm run build_react
scripts.build_and_publish: np minor --tests=false && cd react && np minor --tests=false
